ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

LinkPure is a cross-platform application designed to automatically rewrite URLs copied to the clipboard based on user-defined rules. It offers a visual interface for rule management, includes over 1000 pre-configured rules for cleaning tracking parameters and unwrapping redirects, and provides system notifications for rewritten URLs.

WebDeck is a free, open-source alternative to physical Stream Decks. It's a Flask web application that allows users to control their computer remotely via any browser-enabled device with a touchscreen, offering a customizable interface for shortcuts and commands.

GoMLX is an accelerated machine learning and generic math framework for Go, designed to be a PyTorch/Jax/TensorFlow equivalent for the Go ecosystem. It supports a pure Go backend for broad compatibility and an optimized backend using OpenXLA for high-performance computation on CPUs, GPUs, and TPUs, including distributed training.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Resterm is a powerful terminal-based client designed for interacting with various network protocols including HTTP, GraphQL, gRPC, WebSockets, and SSE. It emphasizes a keyboard-driven workflow and local data storage, offering features like SSH tunnels, OAuth 2.0 support, and a custom scripting language for complex request logic.

Gojekyll is a Go-based implementation of the Jekyll static site generator, offering faster build times and live reloading. It aims for partial compatibility with Jekyll, supporting Liquid templating and Sass, and provides `build` and `serve` commands.
